name: Ceam
about: At CAE's global flight academies, we provide professional commercial pilot training, shaping your skills and mindset for a successful aviation career. With numerous academies worldwide, we are the training partner of choice for major airlines like American Airlines, easyJet, and Qatar Airways. Our programs span the entire life cycle of a pilot, from cadet to captain, and are backed by 75 years of industry leadership in full-flight simulator manufacturing. We offer a supportive environment conducive to successful airline pilot training, emphasizing motivation, ambition, self-discipline, and technical aptitude. With a forecasted 39% growth in pilot demand over the next 10 years, CAE is your gateway to exciting opportunities in aviation. Join us to transform your passion for flight into a fulfilling career.
